show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Going to the Mat
content:
Dr. <!--more--> Louis DiSipio, professor of Chicano and Latino Studies at the University of California-Irvine, discusses the complexities of the “new” Latino electorate and why predictions about its political preferences in the 2012 presidential election may be way off the mark.
The New York City Parents Union is gearing up for a legal battle with the city’s Department of  Education over its decision to distribute morning-after pills and other birth control drugs to students in targeted schools.
NYPU president Mona Davids explains why it’s ”time to go to the mat” with City Hall.
